options.text: 30–50p creative agencies using Microsoft Teams in global campaigns
options.why: Targets larger agencies managing cross-border projects.
assumptions: Microsoft Teams is the main platform

options.text: 10–20p remote UX teams using Trello in sprint planning
options.why: Focus on teams engaged in iterative design cycles.

options.text: 5–15p remote content teams using Asana in project kickoffs
options.why: Targets small teams for efficient project initiation
